H0.text: In medicine, pyrosis is the technical term for which condition. Heartburn

H1.text: In medicine, pyrosis is the technical term for which condition. Esophagitis

H2.text: In medicine, pyrosis is the technical term for which condition. Dyspepsia

H3.text: In medicine, pyrosis is the technical term for which condition. Agita

A4.text: cardialgia, heartburn, pyrosis, dyspepsia, and indigestion were often used interchangeably

A5.text: Endoscopy is a method used to detect abnormalities in the esophageal lining such as erosive esophagitis and Barrett's esophagus.
